member.name: M:Interprise.Facade.CRM.LeadFacade.QualifyLead
member.summary: Activates the lead.

example.code:
Protected Overridable Sub QualifyThisLead() 'Check if there's a lead to qualify If Me.LeadDataset.CRMLead.Rows.Count = 1 'Call the QualifyLead method to mak a lead active. Me.m_leadFacade.QualifyLead()
'Save the lead afterwards. Me.UpdateDataset()
'Supply additional codes here.
End If End Sub
